text: ajlaporte pointed me the right way
<@U401USQPP> How are you using the template_meta.id and label? any particular use case that would be interesting?

I used it once for a banner custom module that was being used in two different contexts. On one page template I wanted it to have a little breadcrumbs section and on the other I didn't, so I wrapped it all in a `{% if template_meta.id == whatever %}`

Ah, okay - Interesting thought: I’m imagining that could be applied across a number of uses (setting variables in custom modules based on a globally accessible parameter). Just thinking of modifying nav or other options based on the current location of the user ‘/page-type/’ or slug is string_containing ‘whatever’
